scripts.scrape-x: node -e "const { scrapeX } = require('./src/x-scraper.js'); const { calculateViralityScore } = require('./src/viral-score.js'); async function run() { const dateArg = process.argv.find(arg => arg.startsWith('--date=')); const date = dateArg ? dateArg.split('=')[1] : 'YYYY-MM-DD'; console.log('Running scrape-x for', date); const posts = await scrapeX(date); // Placeholder for writing to file console.log('Scraping complete. Posts:', posts.length); } run();"
